instName: ﻿Academy of the Brothers of the Christian Schools at St. Patrick's
﻿Academy of the Brothers of the Christian Schools at St. Patrick's

instNote: ﻿This institution, conducted by the Sisters of Mercy, is situated in the most healthy part of the city. A spacious and beautiful addition has been recently added to the building. No efforts have been spared to render the Academy in every way worthy of an extensive patronage.
﻿A select school for young ladies has lately been opened, information of which may be had by addressing the Rev. Superior.
